result.execSummary:
The defendant Amanda A Kellow was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Outstanding financial obligations are not a condition of probation & are to be paid directly to the Shawano Co Clerk of Court office within 30 days.  Debts older than 60 days will be processed for tax intercept & civil judgments.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  Payment plans available for qualifying amounts.
All financials same as noted above.
All financials same as noted above.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: DNA proof of submission - obtained

Defendant Amanda A Kellow in court with attorney John Scott Bartholomew.  Catharine Denise White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea questionnaire received and reviewed.  Defendant pleads guilty to count 1.    Court advises party of their rights, finds factual basis, accepts defendant's waiver of their rights, the plea made, and finds guilty.   Remarks by Atty. White and Atty. Bartholomew.  Defendant makes a statement.  Court makes its findings and pronounces sentence.  Appeal rights given.

Sentence:  $100.00 fine + costs = $679.00.  $50.00 trial preparation fee.

Defendant Amanda A Kellow in court with attorney Sarah Sonia Malcore. Catharine White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Malcore - case is not resolved, goals do not meet DE's goal.  DE wants new counsel.  Court explains rights to DE.  Atty Malcore explains reasoning for withdrawal.  Court grants withdrawal.  DE addresses the court.  Court sets review date - DE to bring new attorney or detailed infor on status.  Review scheduled for October 10, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Amanda A Kellow in court with attorney Sarah Sonia Malcore.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a plea of not guilty.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 10, 2016 at 09:30 am.

Attorney Sarah Sonia Malcore in court.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Summons was mailed out, but defendant does not appear.  Atty. Defendant Amanda A Kellow in court.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA recommends Withheld sentence, 18 months probation with conditions.  Right to counsel given - defendant wishes to speak with an attorney.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 14, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
